span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 富裕的： having a generously sufficient and typically increasing supply of material possessions
【例】 affluent society 富裕的社会
【近】 opulent, loaded, deep-pocketed, silk-stocking, well-endowed, well-off, well-to-do
【反】 needy, impecunious, impoverished, indigent, penurious 贫困的

【记】 af + fluent 流→财源滚滚，财富如流水；音：富禄，又富又有福禄
【另】 flow 流动, fluid 液体
